Description.Text: This family-friendly ski hotel is situated in the centre of Bad Gastein, where guests will find a number of tourist attractions. The ski bus stops are directly in front of the hotel and it is approximately 2 km to the Gondola. The Austrian town of Salzburg is 95 km away and can be reached in 90 minutes by car.
The rooms have been functionally furnished and come with a radio, a direct dial telephone, a safety deposit box and satellite TV. A bathroom with bathtub/shower and hairdryer also features.

Dating back to 1832, this traditional hotel comprises two buildings housing a total of 77 guest rooms and offering comfortable accommodation. Guests are welcomed into the lobby area, which features a hotel safe. A breakfast room can also be found on site.
